text: Sano naga kutundumala kwao (kwakuntundumalila mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ ni yam'biche nayo) kukunkulila (mwanti ngaŵa nkombola kupilila), basi naga n'di ŵakombola kusosa lisomwa (lyakwinjilila) mwitaka kapena makwelelo (gakwelela kwinani) ni kwaichilila nacho chisimosimo (basi tendani, nambo naga ngankombola pililani). Soni Allah angasache angasongangenye (wosope ŵene) pa chongoko, basi ngasim'ba ata panandi mwa ŵandu ajinga
